webwork-tex.statement:
\par Find the equation of a sphere if one of its diameters has endpoints: (7, 6, 7) and (11, 10, 11).
\par
\mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}} = 0
\leavevmode\\\relax Note that you must move everything to the left hand side of the equation and that we desire the coefficients of the quadratic terms to be 1.
